text: 11.29: Jer 6.16 naŋga, Sek 9.9 naŋga, Jo 13.15 naŋga, Fl 2.5 naŋga, 1 Jo 2.6Narɨ yaŋ ŋgandara. Yi yambi taŋguhin mɨŋguhi, mavɨñamɨñɨ kɨndin. Kamataharɨm pata avɨrɨkɨmumara. Narɨ yandɨ vana ŋgata, yandɨ kuyundu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmara. Ahuhɨrɨvɨ bulmakau arɨkitandu pɨŋgwɨyɨ pɨŋgɨrɨmandɨyu vata tamandu maña yandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmara.
